content: skill level beginner materials required 1 yarn the example uses krea deluxe yarn 50 g in a colour 18 or taupe b colour 02 or off white c colour 08 or pink d colour 42 or green one ball of each colour should suffice 2 crochet hook in accordance with the yarn you use 2 5 mm 3 fibrefill/toy stuffing 4 plastic safety eyes 5 mm 5 stitch markers darning embroidery needles 6 pink embroidery thread dmc six strand cotton #224 7 gold yarn e g krea deluxe shiny gold glitter yarn 8 35 mm pom pom maker e g clover
